title: Inappropriate `warning: unreachable expression` in `println!`

labels.name: C-enhancement
labels.description: Category: An issue proposing an enhancement or a PR with one.

labels.name: A-lint
labels.description: Area: Lints (warnings about flaws in source code) such as unused_mut.

labels.name: A-diagnostics
labels.description: Area: Messages for errors, warnings, and lints

labels.name: A-macros
labels.description: Area: All kinds of macros (custom derive, macro_rules!, proc macros, ..)

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
`return` expression in call params of `println!` macro causes inappropriate warning message.

I tried this code (ref: [Playground](https://play.rust-lang.org/?version=stable&mode=debug&edition=2018&gist=1c8219aa795635c0717ba3e5a2a10ad3)):

```rust
fn func1() {
    assert_eq!((), return ());
}

fn func2() {
    println!("{}", return ());
}

fn main() {
    func1();
    func2();
}
```

I expected to print `^^^` against an entire statement:

```text
warning: unreachable expression
 --> src/main.rs:2:5
  |
2 |     assert_eq!((), return ());
  |     ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
  |
  = note: #[warn(unreachable_code)] on by default
  = note: this error originates in a macro outside of the current crate (in Nightly builds, run with -Z external-macro-backtrace for more info)

warning: unreachable expression
 --> src/main.rs:2:5
  |
2 |     assert_eq!((), return ());
  |     ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
  |
  = note: this error originates in a macro outside of the current crate (in Nightly builds, run with -Z external-macro-backtrace for more info)

warning: unreachable expression
 --> src/main.rs:6:20
  |
6 |     println!("{}", return ());
  |     ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
```

But, it was printed against an expression instead of a sentence:

```text
warning: unreachable expression
 --> src/main.rs:2:5
  |
2 |     assert_eq!((), return ());
  |     ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
  |
  = note: #[warn(unreachable_code)] on by default
  = note: this error originates in a macro outside of the current crate (in Nightly builds, run with -Z external-macro-backtrace for more info)

warning: unreachable expression
 --> src/main.rs:2:5
  |
2 |     assert_eq!((), return ());
  |     ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
  |
  = note: this error originates in a macro outside of the current crate (in Nightly builds, run with -Z external-macro-backtrace for more info)

warning: unreachable expression
 --> src/main.rs:6:20
  |
6 |     println!("{}", return ());
  |                    ^^^^^^^^^
```

## Meta

`rustc --version --verbose`: 1.31.1
